title: Abbey of the Everyman
content: #faction/institution Rivals Howlers.

title: Morlean Refugees
content: #faction A group of refugees from Morley who settled in Karnaca during the Morley Famine. Leader: Elder Moira Blackwood Headquarters: Community center (Old Quarter) Territory: Old Quarter neighborhoods Assets: Cultural knowledge, mutual aid network, survivor skills Allies: Howlers, sympathetic citizens Enemies: The Grizzlers (territorial disputes), xenophobic groups Notable NPCs: Community leaders, refugee families, cultural keepers Goals: Establish permanent community, preserve Morlean culture, mutual protection

title: Cult of the Outsider
content:
#faction
This is a template for a faction.

title: Dead Eels Gang
content:
#faction/underworld
Known for piracy along the canals. Rival the Hatters.

title: Eyeless
content:
#faction/underworld
Notorious criminal organization obsessed with the occult.

title: Factions
content: Factions are various groups which vie for control of Karnaca. Underworld Tier Status Eyeless III - Howlers III 1 The Hagsmen II 0 Dead Eels Gang II - Hatters II 0 The Grizzlers II 0 Mercurio Street Gang I -1 Sixways Gang I - Roaring Boys I 0 Institutions Tier Status First Attachment to the Duke IV - Grand Guard III - Abbey of the Everyman III -1 Upper Cyria District Independent Householder's Commission III - Oracular Order II - The Brigade II - Inspectors Division II - Fringe Tier Status Cult of Delilah V - Brigmore Witches IV - Cult of the Outsider IV 0 Regenters II - The Chanters II - Labor & Trade Tier Status Fishers Union III - United Miners of Karnaca - -

title: Brigmore Witches
content: #faction/fringe The Brigmore Witches are a cult of female practicioners of black magic. Leader: Breanna Ashworth Headquarters: Royal Conservatory (Cyria Gardens) Territory: Cyria Gardens, infiltrating Upper Cyria Assets: Gravehounds, magical artifacts, botanical knowledge Allies: Cult of Delilah, some Eyeless members Enemies: Abbey of the Everyman, Oracular Order Notable NPCs: Various sister-witches, botanical researchers Goals: Serve Delilah, expand magical influence, eliminate Abbey presence

title: Cult of Delilah
content: #faction/fringe Cult worshiping the new empress. Leader: Delilah Kaldwin (The Usurper Empress) Headquarters: Grand Palace (Palace District) Territory: Palace District, growing influence in Cyria Gardens Assets: Royal Treasury, Clockwork Soldiers, Brigmore Witches network Allies: Brigmore Witches, some corrupted Palace staff Enemies: Abbey of the Everyman, any remaining Kaldwin loyalists, Grand Guard (conflicted) Notable NPCs: Breanna Ashworth (lieutenant), various Palace courtiers Goals: Consolidate power, eliminate threats to rule, expand magical influence

title: Cult of the Outsider
content: #faction/fringe Secretive society. Leader: The Enlightened (mysterious council) Headquarters: Hidden shrines throughout Upper Cyria Territory: Upper Cyria (secret), cells citywide Assets: Occult knowledge, bone charms, underground network Allies: The Eyeless (some overlap) Enemies: Abbey of the Everyman, Oracular Order Notable NPCs: Various cultists, occult scholars Goals: Spread Outsider worship, undermine the Abbey, seek forbidden knowledge

title: Regenters
content: #faction/fringe Extremist group that seeks to return to the authoritarian rule imposed by Hiram Burrows during the regency. Leader: Former Lord Regent supporter "Colonel" Harwick Headquarters: Private residence (Lower Aventa) Territory: Lower Aventa meetings, scattered supporters Assets: Former regime contacts, authoritarian ideology, hidden weapons Allies: Disaffected former officials, authoritarian sympathizers Enemies: Current Kaldwin Dynasty, democratic elements, most citizens Notable NPCs: Former officials, hardline supporters, underground organizers Goals: Restore authoritarian rule, eliminate current government, return to "order"

title: The Chanters
content: #faction/fringe Group of students with interests in the occult. Leader: Student leader varies Headquarters: University spaces, private homes Territory: Academic areas, student gatherings Assets: Academic resources, occult research, student network Allies: Curious academics, occult researchers Enemies: Abbey of the Everyman, strict authorities Notable NPCs: University students, junior faculty, occult enthusiasts Goals: Study occult phenomena, academic freedom, hidden knowledge

title: Grand Guard
content:
#faction/institution
The military and city watch of Karnaca.

title: Hatters
content:
#faction/underworld
Small group connected to a former Dunwall gang. Ingest smuggled goods from Dunwall.

title: Howlers
content: #faction/underworld Gang which sees themselves as idealists and revolutionaries trying to overthrow the corrupt Grand Guard. Rival Grand Guard. Currently at war with the Abbey of the Everyman.

title: Abbey of the Everyman
content: #faction/institution Religious order which believes "the universe is unknowably vast and swarming with all manner of dangerous spirits and forces, most of which are hostile to man's existence." State religion of the Empire. Rivals Howlers. Leader: Vice Overseer Liam Byrne (Vice Overseer of Karnaca) Headquarters: Overseer Chapel (Campo Seta Dockyards) Territory: Campo Seta, shrines throughout city Assets: Music boxes, Overseers, religious authority Allies: Oracular Order, Grand Guard (officially) Enemies: All occult factions, Howlers, criminal organizations Notable NPCs: Various Overseers, Abbey scribes Goals: Eliminate heresy, maintain religious order, combat supernatural threats

title: First Attachment to the Duke
content:
#faction/institution
The Duke of Serkonos' personal guards.

Leader: Captain Mortimer Ramsey
Headquarters: Grand Palace
Territory: Palace District exclusively
Assets: Elite guards, palace armory, direct ducal authority
Allies: Grand Guard (officially), Palace Civic Patrol
Enemies: Anyone threatening ducal power
Notable NPCs: Various elite guardsmen
Goals: Protect the Duke (now complicated by Delilah's presence)

title: Grand Guard
content:
#faction/institution
The military and city watch of Karnaca.

Leader: Captain Ramsey (conflicted loyalty to Duke/Delilah)
Headquarters: Quintana Point Barracks
Territory: Most of Karnaca officially, practically weakened
Assets: City watch stations, armories, prison facilities
Allies: First Attachment (officially), Palace Civic Patrol
Enemies: Howlers, most criminal organizations
Notable NPCs: Inspector Hume (Inspectors Division), Sergeant Blake
Goals: Maintain order (increasingly difficult), navigate political upheaval

title: Inspectors Division
content: #faction/institution Division of the Grand Guard tasked with rooting out internal corruption. Underfunded and largely powerless. Leader: Inspector Hume Headquarters: Small office in Grand Guard complex Territory: City-wide (limited authority) Assets: Investigation skills, limited Grand Guard resources, integrity Allies: Honest Grand Guard members (few), concerned citizens Enemies: Corrupt officials, criminal organizations Notable NPCs: Deputy inspectors, informants, whistleblowers Goals: Root out corruption, restore Grand Guard integrity, bring justice

title: Oracular Order
content: #faction/institution Leader: High Oracle (name varies by campaign) Headquarters: Somonos Oracular Chapel (Padilla Towne) Territory: Padilla Towne, scattered throughout city Assets: Prophetic abilities, network of blind sisters, religious influence Allies: Abbey of the Everyman Enemies: Brigmore Witches, Cult of the Outsider Notable NPCs: Various Oracle Sisters, chapel attendants Goals: Divine guidance, combat witchcraft, maintain spiritual purity

title: The Brigade
content:
#faction/institution
Detachment of the Grand Guard responsible for managing fires and the bloodfly concern.

Leader: Fire Captain Rodriguez
Headquarters: Fire Station (multiple districts)
Territory: City-wide emergency response
Assets: Fire engines, bloodfly expertise, emergency authority
Allies: Grand Guard (officially), grateful citizens
Enemies: Arsonists, bloodfly sources
Notable NPCs: Firefighters, bloodfly specialists, emergency responders
Goals: Fire prevention, bloodfly control, public safety

title: Upper Cyria District Independent Householder's Commission
content: #faction/institution Organization which maintains the Upper Cyria district. Leader: Commissioner Whitworth Headquarters: Upper Cyria District Office Territory: Upper Cyria exclusively Assets: Private security, maintenance crews, social connections Allies: The Eyeless (unofficial), wealthy residents Enemies: Criminal elements threatening property values Notable NPCs: Wealthy residents, private guards, city planners Goals: Maintain exclusive district, protect property values, keep out "undesirables"

title: Fishers Union
content: #faction/labor_and_trade Group of factory workers at the Santiago Fisheries. Leader: Captain Montrose Headquarters: Santiago Fisheries Territory: Santiago Fisheries, fishing docks Assets: Fishing fleet, processing facilities, worker network Allies: Howlers (unofficial), dock workers Enemies: Factory owners who exploit workers Notable NPCs: Union representatives, boat captains, dock workers Goals: Better working conditions, fair wages, protect fishing rights

title: United Miners of Karnaca
content: #faction/labor_and_trade Union of silver miners. Leader: Lucia Pastor Headquarters: Miner's Rest Tavern (Dust District) Territory: Dust District, mining areas Assets: Worker solidarity, knowledge of underground passages, mining equipment Allies: Howlers, Morlean Refugees Enemies: Grand Guard, mine owners, Duke's administration Notable NPCs: Veteran miners, union organizers, worker families Goals: Fair wages, safe working conditions, end dust storm negligence

title: Mercurio Street Gang
content: #faction/underworld

title: Roaring Boys
content:
#faction/underworld
Splinter faction of the Hatters. Main source of income is shipping contraband, including weapons and equipment used by the Grand Guard.

title: Sixways Gang
content:
#faction/underworld
This is a template for a faction.This is a template for a faction.

title: The Grizzlers
content:
#faction/underworld
Street toughs who run protection rackets in the Old Quarter.

title: The Hagsmen
content: #faction/underworld Gang of smugglers and cutthroats known to dump bodies in the canal for the hagfish to dispose of.

title: Dead Eels Gang
content:
#faction/underworld
Known for piracy along the canals. Rival the Hatters.

Leader: "Eel Eye" Patricia
Headquarters: Floating barge (Canal District)
Territory: Canal piracy operations
Assets: Fast boats, canal knowledge, piracy expertise
Allies: The Hagsmen
Enemies: Hatters, merchant vessels, Grand Guard water patrol
Notable NPCs: Boat crews, canal pirates, fence operations
Goals: Control canal piracy, steal valuable cargo, avoid capture

title: Eyeless
content: #faction/underworld Notorious criminal organization obsessed with the occult. Leader: Dolores Michaels, Ivan Jacobi, Shan Yun (Triumvirate) Headquarters: Dolores Michaels Deposit & Loan (Upper Cyria) Territory: Upper Cyria, financial district operations Assets: Banking network, blackmail material, occult artifacts Allies: Cult of the Outsider (some members), corrupt officials Enemies: Abbey of the Everyman, honest law enforcement Notable NPCs: Bank employees, occult financiers, corrupt aristocrats Goals: Accumulate wealth and occult power, manipulate city finances

title: Hatters
content:
#faction/underworld
Small group connected to a former Dunwall gang. Ingest smuggled goods from Dunwall.

Leader: "Bowler" McGrath
Headquarters: Hat shop front (Canal District)
Territory: Dunwall smuggling connections
Assets: Dunwall connections, smuggling expertise, quality contraband
Allies: Dunwall criminal contacts
Enemies: Dead Eels Gang, local competitors
Notable NPCs: Smuggling contacts, Dunwall liaisons, contraband dealers
Goals: Maintain Dunwall trade route, smuggle quality goods, eliminate rivals

title: Howlers
content: #faction/underworld Gang which sees themselves as idealists and revolutionaries trying to overthrow the corrupt Grand Guard. Rival Grand Guard. Currently at war with the Abbey of the Everyman. Leader: Paolo (The Undying) Headquarters: Crone's Hand Saloon (Dust District) Territory: Dust District, influence in Santiago Fisheries Assets: Street network, smuggling routes, popular support Allies: United Miners of Karnaca, Morlean Refugees, Hagsmen Enemies: Grand Guard, Abbey of the Everyman Notable NPCs: Byrne (if turned), various gang lieutenants Goals: Overthrow corrupt authority, control Dust District trade

title: Mercurio Street Gang
content:
#faction/underworld

Leader: "Quick Silver" Mercurio
Headquarters: Street corners (various districts)
Territory: Small-time operations city-wide
Assets: Street-level intelligence, petty crime network, youth recruitment
Allies: Larger gangs (as needed)
Enemies: Law enforcement, rival small gangs
Notable NPCs: Street youth, petty criminals, neighborhood informants
Goals: Survive and grow, avoid bigger gang conflicts, make quick money

title: Roaring Boys
content: #faction/underworld Splinter faction of the Hatters. Main source of income is shipping contraband, including weapons and equipment used by the Grand Guard. Leader: Former Hatter "Roaring" Bill Headquarters: Warehouse (Canal District) Territory: Contraband shipping routes Assets: Shipping connections, weapons smuggling, Grand Guard contacts Allies: Corrupt Grand Guard members Enemies: Hatters (former allies), honest law enforcement Notable NPCs: Weapons smugglers, corrupt guards, shipping contacts Goals: Profit from weapons trade, maintain Grand Guard corruption, avoid detection

title: Sixways Gang
content: #faction/underworld Leader: "Six-Shot" Sammy Headquarters: Abandoned building (Canal District) Territory: Six-way intersection control Assets: Strategic location, toll collection, local intimidation Allies: Occasionally other small gangs Enemies: Anyone challenging their intersection, Grand Guard Notable NPCs: Intersection guards, toll collectors, local toughs Goals: Control intersection traffic, collect tolls, maintain small territory

title: The Grizzlers
content: #faction/underworld Street toughs who run protection rackets in the Old Quarter. Leader: "Big Jack" Torrino Headquarters: The Growling Hound Pub (Old Quarter) Territory: Old Quarter protection rackets Assets: Street muscle, protection network, local businesses Allies: Howlers (uneasy alliance) Enemies: Morlean Refugees (competition for territory) Notable NPCs: Protection racket enforcers, affiliated shopkeepers Goals: Control Old Quarter commerce, collect protection fees, maintain territory

title: The Hagsmen
content: #faction/underworld Gang of smugglers and cutthroats known to dump bodies in the canal for the hagfish to dispose of. Leader: "Fishgut" Morris Headquarters: Abandoned warehouse (Canal District) Territory: Canal District smuggling routes Assets: Canal knowledge, body disposal expertise, smuggling network Allies: Howlers, Dead Eels Gang Enemies: Grand Guard, rival smugglers Notable NPCs: Canal runners, hagfish handlers, smuggling contacts Goals: Control canal smuggling, maintain body disposal service, avoid law enforcement

title: Karnaca
content: #location/city #empire_of_the_isles/serkonos/karnaca The capital city of Serkonos, the southernmost island of the Empire of the Isles. Districts of Karnaca Campo Seta Dockyards Dust District Old Quarter

title: Serkonos
content: #location/nation #empire_of_the_isles/serkonos Serkonos is the southernmost of the four main islands of the Empire of the Isles. The capital city of Serkonos is Karnaca, on the southern coast. The isle is known for its warm, tropical climate and vast beaches. It is ruled by a Duke. The principal police force of Serkonos is the Grand Guard. Its primary cities are Karnaca, Cullero, Saggunto, and Bastillian.
